channel.title: Tech Stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Stocks on FinanClub

item.title: CRM
item.description: score:172 Chances: Tech stocks were the talk of Wall Street in 2023 centering around Magnificent Seven and AI drivers, and it looks like that will continue in 2024. Companies placing major investments in AI across their respective business models may signal a paradigm shift, which could have a positive impact on Salesforce, Inc.

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:59 Chances: The Oakmark Global Fund showed robust absolute gains in the fourth quarter, indicating a positive performance for Oracle Corp. Tech stocks were the talk of Wall Street in 2023, and it looks like that will continue in 2024, which bodes well for Oracle’s prospects.
